job.title: Software Engineer - New Graduate 2022
job.description: Squarespace is looking for enthusiastic New Graduates to join our Software Engineering teams in New York City We have a variety of highly innovative and evolving teams at Squarespace who are pushing out the next generation of web platform technologies As a Software Engineer at Squarespace you will be empowered to help our customers succeed from Day One Through mentorship a robust engineering onboarding program and collaboration across teams youll have all the tools youll need to ramp up quickly and contribute meaningful workltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur New Grad TeamsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtBackend Backend teams work with our Frontend counterparts to build the website creation and editing experience Backend teams are also responsible for evolving Squarespaces massive engine that serves millions of users worldwide For Backend you will need experience in Java with a strong ability in data structures algorithms and problem solvingltbrgtltbrgtFrontend Our Frontend teams are responsible for building one of the most advanced interfaces on the web with an intricate eye for design For Frontend you will need experience in JavaScriptltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtHow To ApplyltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtPlease review team descriptions and note the team language requirementsltligtltligtSelect the two teams that interest you the mostltligtltligtWell review your application and if your experience looks like a match well send you a takehome assessment before moving on to interviewsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualifications For All RolesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtCurrently enrolled student graduating in December 2021 or Spring 2022ltligtltligtPursuing a BS or MS in Computer Science Computer Engineering or a related technical disciplineltligtltligtA foundation in computer science with competencies in data structures algorithms and software design practicesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout SquarespaceltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtSquarespace makes beautiful products to help people with creative ideas succeed By blending elegant design and sophisticated engineering we empower millions of people  from individuals and local artists to entrepreneurs shaping the worlds most iconic businesses  to share their stories with the world Squarespaces team of more than 1200 is headquartered in downtown New York City with offices in Dublin Los Angeles and Portland For more information visit wwwsquarespacecomaboutltbrgtltbrgtBenefits ampamp PerksltbrgtltulgtltligtHealth insurance with 100 premium covered for you and your dependent childrenltligtltligtFlexible vacation ampamp paid time offltligtltligtUp to 20 weeks of paid family leaveltligtltligtEquity plan for all employeesltligtltligtRetirement benefits with employer matchltligtltligtFertility and adoption benefitsltligtltligtFree lunch and snacks at all officesltligtltligtEducation reimbursementltligtltligtDogfriendly workplace in New York officeltligtltligtCommuter benefit in the form of reduced tax Ireland and pretax USltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtOur CommitmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtToday more than a million people around the globe use Squarespace to share different perspectives and experiences with the world Not only do we embrace and celebrate the diversity of our customer base but we also strive for the same in our employees At Squarespace we are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race color ethnicity ancestry religion national origin gender sex gender identity or expression sexual orientation age citizenship marital or parental status disability veteran status or other class protected by applicable law We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace
